```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
data <- lterdatasampler::arc_weather %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(date)) %>% 
  mutate(year = ymd(date)) %>% 
  mutate(month = month(date)) %>% 
  mutate(day = day(date))

ggplot(data = data) +
  geom_line(aes(x = date, y = mean_airtemp)) +
  theme_bw()

# Grouping by month:
bymonth <- data %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  summarize(m_airtemp = mean(mean_airtemp),
            sd = sd(mean_airtemp))

# Grouping by year:
byyear <- data %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(m_airtemp = mean(mean_airtemp),
            sd = sd(mean_airtemp))
```
